The DurakGame class¶

class Game.DurakGame(n_players: int, deck_mode: str, dealer=False)¶

Bases: Game.Game

State machine for game of Durak.

begin_game(n_players, deck_mode)¶

Deck is first shuffled, then 6 cards are dealt to each of the players. Finally the game’s Field object is initialized.

get_action_size(player_id)¶

Available actions given player

Parameters

player_id (int) – index for player

get_game_ended()¶

Will return True when game is over.

get_init_field()¶

Initial Field

get_next_state(action, player_id)¶

This function gets the state of the next field, given a player_id and the move they perform. If player is in wait mode, then we can just move on to next player. If player is in attack mode, then we execute the move, and then have defending player make a move. If player is in defend mode, then we let them execute the move, then depending on whether field is active / inactive, allow the next attacking player to make a move.

get_valid_moves(player_id)¶
Input:

players: current player(s)

Returns

a binary vector of length self.get_action_size(), 1 for moves that are valid from the current board and player, 0 for invalid moves

Return type

validMoves

string_representation()¶

Print string representation of field.

The DurakField class¶

class Field.DurakField(deck, hands, players)¶

Bases: Field.Field

This class defines legal moves you can make in a game of Durak, given every players’ hands and the current cards played on the field.

Returns every possible defense given valid_defenses.
